title: Dark clouds dim General Electric's light even more
text:
Dark clouds dim General Electric's light even more 8:26pm GMT - 01:59 
General Electric restated earnings for 2016 and 2107 due to an accounting scandal, the latest in a growing list of troubles for the once-storied industrial conglomerate.   
General Electric restated earnings for 2016 and 2107 due to an accounting scandal, the latest in a growing list of troubles for the once-storied industrial conglomerate.  //reut.rs/2ESNRKy
